title: Peanut
description: AI-powered cleaning robot designed for commercial spaces, operating autonomously with advanced navigation and disinfection capabilities.
fullDescription: Peanut is an advanced cleaning robot developed by Peanut Robotics, aimed at automating cleaning tasks in commercial environments such as hotels, offices, and stores.

specifications.Navigation: Autonomous movement with advanced AI and transformer-based technology
specifications.Cleaning Mechanism: Equipped with specialized cloth for surface cleaning and disinfection
specifications.Disinfection: EPA-rated chemicals with 99.999% efficacy against human coronaviruses
specifications.Operation Time: Continuous operation with periodic charging cycles
specifications.Mobility: Wheeled base with omnidirectional movement capabilities

capabilities: Autonomous Cleaning: Independent cleaning without human supervision
Advanced Navigation: Reaches tight areas using AI pathfinding
Continuous Learning: Enhances processes through data collection
Disinfection: Medical-grade disinfection with EPA-rated solutions
applications: Hospitality: Hotels and resorts for automated cleaning
Corporate: Office buildings for routine maintenance
Retail: Commercial outlets for floor cleaning
Healthcare: Medical facilities for specialized cleaning
